definition: impromptu/improvised/to take one's seat (at a banquet etc)
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc

sentences.english: The left slice shows an area active during extemporaneous speech just posterior and adjacent to the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 左切片显示面积活跃在即席讲话只是后，毗邻的肿瘤。

sentences.english: This pattern is well known to students who compete in impromptu speaking contests.
sentences.chinese: 参加即席演讲比赛的学生们都知道这种方法。

sentences.english: You will have one minute to prepare your impromptu speech.
sentences.chinese: 你将会有一分钟准备你的即席演讲。

sentences.english: I’m not good at speaking off the cuff.
Giving an impromptu speech is not as difficult as it seems .
sentences.chinese: 即席演讲似乎不那么困难。

sentences.english: The pianist improvised an accompaniment to the song.
sentences.chinese: 那位钢琴家为那首歌即席伴奏。

sentences.english: When do we make impromptu speeches?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候要做即席演讲？

sentences.english: The ability to show a sense of humor at off-the-cuff and casual conversations is also incredibly important.
sentences.chinese: 在即席和非正式谈话中显示幽默感也非常重要。

sentences.english: The professor threw off a few remarks at the end of the speech contest.
sentences.chinese: 教授在演讲比赛结束时即席说了几句话。

sentences.english: The president extemporized a speech after the working dinner.
sentences.chinese: 总裁即席发表了一篇工作餐后演说。

sentences.english: His ad-lib comments showed poor judgment.
sentences.chinese: 他的即席评论显得缺乏判断力。

sentences.english: The speaker can extemporize on any of a number of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 该演讲人对若干题目中的任一个都能即席发言。

sentences.english: I can make impromptu speeches even on topics about which I have almost no information.
sentences.chinese: 您即使对几乎一无所知既题目都能够作即席演讲。

sentences.english: Table Topics are great training for these types of situations.
sentences.chinese: 即席演讲是这些类型的情况的最好训练。

sentences.english: The first time I spoke was in Table Topics.
sentences.chinese: 第一次发言，是即席演讲。

sentences.english: To present an impromptu or extemporaneous speech fluently with good language demands constant practice.
sentences.chinese: 用流利生动英语即席演说需要练习。
